[close to real playing experience] The real card playing experience, the card playing no longer appears and disappears out of thin air, but remains on the table until the end of the game. In the future, we will add hand flying animation to let you experience the real playing process! [interesting game animation] Airplanes, bombs and landlord peasants also have rich expressions and actions, adding more joy to the fight against landlord. [clean and fresh design industry] Small fresh interface design suitable for summer heat, let you feel different leisure, entertainment, chess and card style
